divs: Sighting DetailsMy mother and Her friend luz are the witnesses. I had to speak with her friend, because my mom really didn't wanted to talk or think about it. She said- we were driving on the highway , getting off of 520 , trying to Get into 195 north... We see a lots of police due to a deathly accident. I asked one of the police man, how to get the best route to get home. After driving approximately 10 minutes through a working on road (nobody working at that time) my mom, the one driving, asked her friend, - If those lights were a plane, do you see that. -from What luz were telling me.. She said, they stated Driving slow, then it stop in front of the car, she described it as triangular with grenn lights and red lights in the middle of a circular shape. To be honest, she wants somebody to talk About this. She wants answers, im trying yo explain her because i watch alot of ufo programs on history channel. Please, call me as soon as posSible.
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
